body.name: Pure Enrichment® PureSteam™ Pro Upright Clothes Steamer - Professional Standing Garment Steamer & Foot Pedal - Half Gallon Tank with 1 Hr of Sanitizing Steam at 4 Heat Levels that Heats in 45 Seconds
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 6 mins
features: STANDING GARMENT STEAMER: This superior steamer heats in only 45 seconds to deliver up to 1500 watts of safe, thermostat-controlled steaming power reaching 208℉. Four steaming levels tackle all kinds of stubborn wrinkles, while the 2L tank allows for a full hour of continuous steaming.

DE-WRINKLE & SANITIZE FABRICS: Refresh, soften, and remove wrinkles on a wide range of fabrics, including clothing, delicates, bedding, curtains, upholstered furniture and more. The steam is gentle enough to work on different types of fabric, such as silk, cotton, linen, and denim.

PORTABLE, PEDAL-POWERED STEAMING: There’s no need to hold a cumbersome steam button or manually pump the nozzle for steam output. Use the pedal at the base to easily turn the steamer on and off. The adjustable pole allows you to change the height, while the wheels on the bottom let you take this standing steamer with you anywhere.

EASY-FILL TANK & CONVENIENT HANGER: The transparent water tank makes it easy to see when it’s time to refill. Simply detach to fill up the tank again. The additional garment hanger and fabric brush attachments for an easier and more effective steaming experience

WHAT YOU GET: Upright garment steamer, garment hanger, fabric brush, ETL-approved power adapter, industry-leading 5 Year Warranty, caring customer support 7 days a week, and the peace of mind that comes from a trusted brand with millions of customers worldwide.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pure Enrichment PureSteam Pro Upright Clothes Steamer Product Specifications: Base Dimensions: 13.7” x 8.9” x 11” | Total Height: 4’ 6” | Weight: 9.9 lbs, | Power Cord Length: 7’

Dewrinkle Your Garments Start refreshing fabrics in just 45 seconds with the added attachments. The versatile hanger with clips holds different sized garments, the fabric brush removes tough wrinkles from heavy fabrics, and the telescopic pole and flexible hose allows for an easily adjustable steamer height. Pedal Powered With 4 steam levels, the simple lever allows hands-free control of turning the unit on and off while the built-in thermostat prevents the steamer from ever overheating. Level 1 is the humidity function, level 2 is for ironing short-sleeves, level 3 for shirts, and level 4 for suits. A Whole-Home Product PureSteam Pro is not just for steaming your clothes. Whether at home or on the road, de-wrinkle and freshen up all types of fabrics such as clothing, coats, curtains, drapes, table linens, upholstered furniture, and many other types. Detachable Water Tank Steam clothing or other household fabrics without running out of water with our large 2-liter tank. The detachable tank makes filling or emptying the tank a breeze. Its high capacity allows for up to an hour of continuous steam, while its visible design provides easy water level monitoring.

Convenient and Easy Storage Save on storage space when you ditch the cumbersome ironing board for our easy-to-use upright steamer. Save Time & Money In just 45 seconds, quickly steam your favorite clothes and save money on expensive dry cleaning services. Maintain Your Favorite Fabrics Garment steamers are a gentler alternative for fabrics, keeping them fresher and wrinkle-free longer than traditional de-wrinkling methods.

PureSteam Pro Upright Clothes Steamer PureSteam XL Standing Fabric Steamer PureSteam Portable Fabric Steamer (White) PureSteam Portable Fabric Steamer (Black) Size 13.7” x 8.9” x 11” 14” x 9.25” x 12.2” 8″ x 5.5″ x 3.2″ 8″ x 5.5″ x 3.2″ Tank Capacity 2 L 2 L 130 ml 130 ml Heating Time 45 seconds 45 seconds 2 minutes 2 minutes Steam Time Up to 60 minutes per tank refill on Level 4 Up to 60 minutes per tank refill 10 minutes 10 minutes Steam Levels 4 1 1 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product! Works well and easy to use. Erases those wrinkles beautifully!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! Well worth the money
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is easy to assemble and easy to use. The unit is stable even on carpeting. The pole has an attached hanger that is adjustable in width to accommodate all sizes of garments. The steam flows well without any drips. Great investment in my quest to not use dry cleaners. I use the at home dry cleaning methods then steam my garment, works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Having a fountain of distilled water in your closet would be a brilliant addition!
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is wonderful, sturdy, easy to clean and operate. I suspect, it goes through the distilled water so fast as a result of its impressive steam capabilities. I find myself always needing more water. I can easily go through 2 gallons if I need to steam items after traveling to return to my closet. If I wasn't such a clothes hog I'd suspect that maybe a gallon would be ample. I do find it pleasurable to get the job done when results prove such a professional finish.I'd caution you to not let young ones near the steam head as it will burn, I've caught myself not paying the attention required and I have had a couple minor wrist burns. Buy it and invest in distilled water!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great alternative to hauling out the ironing board
reviews.reviewText: My PureSteam Pro upright steamer arrived in good condition and has performed well thus far. It heats the water quickly and is easy to use. It's also reasonably easy to move around. The garment hanger works well, although I do find that, when using the clips on the hanger, they're prone to moving around, which is to say it's hard to keep them spread apart to keep the garment taut. (I'll probably devise some fix for that.) It's a nice, professional-styler steamer for the price. I would recommend the Puresteam Pro steamer without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Steamer! Love it. Best I've ever had.
reviews.reviewText: I've had a bunch of steamers and this by far is the best. So easy to turn on/off, large water tank, good amount of steam and the fact that the hanger part attaches to the pole so securely makes it so much easier. So many of the others have just a hook that you have to hang a hanger on and the hanger swings while you are trying to steam. There are only 2 minor things I wish I could change-- but this by all means should not keep you from buying this steamer. I wish is that the clips didn't slide so easily because sometimes they move together when you hang an item and also that it had an auto shut off feature after running for a long while. Its so easy to turn the steamer off with the tap of your foot but I'm just waiting for the day one of my teenagers doesn't do it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, heats quickly, easy to move.
reviews.reviewText: The steamer arrived on time and in perfect condition. It was easy to assemble and its use is intuitive. The foot pedal for control of the on and off switch is convenient, much more efficient than bending over to use one's hands.The steamer heats in a matter of seconds - probably 30 to 45 and makes quick work of wrinkles.We have elected to use our own hangers rather than use the one that came with the product. We found that our clothes hung better with our own hangers than the one provided and allowed us to better remove wrinkles.In all, this was a good purchase and worth the price paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It steams well
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I am quite impressed with the steamer's design. It manages to strike a perfect balance between functionality and aesthetic appeal, delivering efficient steaming performance while looking sleek. Unlike previous steamers I've owned, this one stands firm and doesn't topple over easily, which is a huge relief.However, there is one particular issue that I've encountered with this steamer: the hose tends to kink when attempting various steaming maneuvers, causing a hindrance in the steam flow towards the nozzle. As a result, I often find myself needing to hold the hose with one hand, compromising the ease and safety of using the steamer. This requirement of holding the hose diminishes the convenience factor that drew me to this steamer in the first place.In conclusion, while I appreciate the overall design and impressive steaming capabilities of this steamer, the issue with the kinking hose is a notable drawback. Having to constantly hold the hose while operating the steamer undermines its ease of use and safety. Addressing this concern would greatly enhance the overall experience and make it a truly exceptional steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars loved this steamer... and now i love the company
reviews.reviewText: This is a great steamer. I used to live in the garment district and had a heavy-duty professional one; this one is smaller, lighter, and just as functional. Quite a few times i left it on and forgot, 15 minutes later it's still putting out steam and happy as a clam. Then one afternoon after 2 yrs of 2x daily use (that'd be $50/year or like 15 cents a day?) it just stopped turning on. Wanh! Got in touch with the company to see if they had any advice, assuming I'd never hear back... and they responded within hours! And ultimately replaced it. So hassle free, so prompt, so unusual. Why would anyone take the time to review a steamer? That's why! And PS for any of you considering off-label use, I found it's also really good for styling curly hair. Hence the 2x daily use.
I use this on everything from clothes to sanitizing my pet's litter boxes after a cleaning. Keeps them safe from nasty chemicals and saves me money. Very convenient and seems sturdy.

I work in the fashion industry and am weary of new steamers but this gets the job done for me. I work will all fabric types and the heat settings on this are convenient. Sometimes the steam slows down and you have to hold the handle high to get it flowing again, but I've never used a steamer where that wasnt the case, even industrial steamers. The handle does get hot so recommend a glove if steaming for long periods.

I purchased this steamer in November 2020. I really liked the look of it and thought it worked well. My husband didn't like the piece that sticks out on the bottom of the steamer head. He said it would pull on sweaters. I didn't have that issue. And out of nowhere the steamer just stopped working the other day. The light went off and it just died. We only had it for seventeen months and it's done. This was was the third steamer I have purchased(two Conair, one Pure Enrichment). Instead of buying another steamer for another $150, I took the plunge and ordered the Jiffy J-2000 it's double the price but at least it has a three year warranty.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sleek design and quick and constant steam
reviews.reviewText: Our first purchase of this product leaked so the entire contents would be gone in a day and it was brand new. Pure Enrichment was amazing to deal with and they replaced it within a couple days and the new one works amazing. It is our 3rd brand of steamer and is by far the best. We only use distilled water to avoid lime scale buildup.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great until it doesn't; Stopped working within 1 yr
reviews.reviewText: Only used 4-5 times; unfortunately, not working anymore (no steam at all, boiler not starting). Had it for less than 1yr and seller is no longer on Amazon :(
